front.title: ATN Topology Considerations for Aeronautical NEMO RO

abstract.t: The aviation industry is in the process of moving from legacy and ISO-based protocols to an IP-based environment. This task will require adoption, modification and/or creation of IETF related protocols. The intention of this draft is therefore to provide an overview of the operational environment and the topology of the Aeronautical Telecommunications Network to the IETF.
